author: Dan Strumpf
title: Look Inside This Chinese Smartphone and See It’s Made in America
text:
A peek inside ZTE Corp.’s flagship smartphone reveals how heavily dependent the Chinese telecom giant is on American technology suppliers—and how badly it needs a deal to lift a U.S. ban on shipments to the company.
U.S. companies supply 60% of the electronic components in ZTE’s Axon M smartphone, according to ABI Research Inc., a market-forecasting firm.
